name: lri-monorepo
description: Liminal Resonance Interface - Layer 8 for Human-AI Communication
author: LRI Contributors

scripts.validate: npm run validate:schemas && npm run validate:vocab
scripts.validate:schemas: ajv validate -s schemas/lce-v0.1.json -d 'schemas/examples/*.json' --spec=draft2020 || echo 'Install ajv-cli: npm install -g ajv-cli ajv-formats'
scripts.validate:vocab: python -c "import yaml; yaml.safe_load(open('vocab/intent.yaml')); yaml.safe_load(open('vocab/affect.yaml')); print('âœ“ Vocabularies valid')" || echo 'Install PyYAML: pip install pyyaml'
scripts.example:express: cd examples/express-app && npm install && npm run dev
scripts.example:fastapi: cd examples/fastapi-app && pip install -r requirements.txt && python main.py
